tool_description: Processes refund payments through various payment methods, handles transaction validation, and manages payment gateway communications for return refunds.

original_payment_method.description: Original payment method: credit_card, debit_card, paypal, bank_transfer, store_credit

customer_id.description: Customer identifier for the refund recipient

original_transaction_id.description: Original transaction identifier to refund against

refund_reason_code.description: Reason code: customer_return, defective_product, wrong_item, damaged_goods

error_messages: Invalid refund amount: Amount must be greater than 0 and not exceed original transaction amount.
Payment method not supported: Use one of [credit_card, debit_card, paypal, bank_transfer, store_credit].
Transaction not found: Original transaction_id does not exist or is not refundable.
Payment gateway error: Unable to process refund due to gateway communication failure.
Invalid reason code: Use one of [customer_return, defective_product, wrong_item, damaged_goods].
Refund limit exceeded: Refund amount exceeds the remaining refundable balance for this transaction.
usage: Provide refund_amount, original_payment_method, customer_id, original_transaction_id, and refund_reason_code. The tool processes the refund and returns transaction details.

refund_transaction_id.description: Unique transaction ID for the refund

processing_status.description: Status of refund processing: completed, pending, failed

estimated_completion.description: Estimated date when refund will appear in customer account

gateway_reference.description: Payment gateway reference number for tracking

processing_fee.description: Any processing fee charged for the refund
